news.title: Verified video shows Air India plane descending moments before crash
news.summary: A plane bound for London Gatwick carrying 242 people has crashed after taking off from Ahmedabad in India.

news.title: What we know so far about Air India flight AI171
news.summary: More than 200 people were on board the flight to London Gatwick when it crashed shortly after take-off.

news.title: Watch: BBC correspondent reports from crash site as rescuers work among wreckage
news.summary: Air India say there were 169 Indian nationals on board the flight, as-well as 53 Britons, one Canadian national and seven Portuguese nationals.

news.title: At the scene: 'Everyone is running, trying to save as many lives as possible'
news.summary: The scene at the crash site is shocking, the BBC's Roxy Gagdekar writes.

news.title: Reeves refuses to rule out tax rises after economy shrinks
news.summary: The chancellor highlights "uncertainty" in the world as economists warn of tax rises if the economy fails to grow.

news.title: These touts made millions - and claimed staff at big ticketing firms helped
news.summary: The touts alleged staff at resale sites Ticketmaster once owned helped them trade in bulk, the BBC reveals.

news.title: Watchdog finds Iran failing to meet nuclear obligations for first time in 20 years
news.summary: Iran had warned European powers not to back the resolution, which carries the threat of an eventual referral to the UN Security Council.

news.title: Man trapped inside NI leisure centre tells of fear as rioters attacked
news.summary: Masked youths attacked a leisure centre and set it on fire as violence spread to other towns in Northern Ireland.

news.title: Poundland sold for £1 with shops set to close
news.summary: The BBC understands up to 100 of the brand's 825 UK stores could close as the new owners shake up the business.

news.title: Jesús polished luxury vehicles at an LA car wash for years. Then ICE showed up
news.summary: The BBC obtained CCTV of the raid that shows how President Trump's immigration crackdown has ramped up.
